topic.title: HPE Helion 1.3 Development Platform: Enable Container Deployment

body.p:
For security, Docker container deployments are disabled. There are two ways to enable container deployment:
Add sudo permissions to users within an organization
Donâ€™t require sudo for Docker apps (disable entirely)

section.title: Add sudo Permission for All Users

ol.li: Navigate to Admin > Quotas > Edit Quota
Uncheck the Allow Sudo checkbox and click Update.
Navigate to Settings > HPE Helion Development Platform Settings > Docker Apps Settings
